alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 1:01PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lackawanna and eastern Luzerne Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 101 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moscow, or 10 miles south of Scranton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moscow, Lehigh, Gouldsboro, Springbrook Corners, Daleville, Yostville and Fells Corners. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 380 between 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
